favourite.article: These rapids of life will not relent but swiftly reach the end, The Triune God mingling with men, The New Jerusalem! Hallelujah! Praise the Lord for this river of life!
Forget the Amazon River... THIS RIVER IS HHHHUUUUGGGEEEE AND THIS RIVER DDDEEEPPPP AND THIS RIVER IS WIWWIIIDDDEEE AND THIS RIVER IS CLEAR AND THIS RIVER IS PURE AND THIS RIVER IS LLLIIIIIIFFFFFFEEE!
Amen! This river is huge, this river is deep, this river is wide! It's flowing out from the smitten rock, the Savior's side!
